title: Radhakrishnan & Nivetha's wedding
description: Wedding Rituals: Mangala Snanam: On the wedding day's dawn, both the bride and groom undergo a ceremonial bath, signifying purification. It's followed by a ritual where they are anointed with oils and turmeric. Pada Puja: As the groom sits at the mandapam (wedding altar), the bride's parents wash his feet. It's a gesture of respect and welcome. Kanyadaan: A poignant moment when the bride's father hands over his daughter's hand to the groom, entrusting him with her care and well-being.

title: Adit & Paridhi's wedding
description: The most important ceremony in the Hindu Culture. As we encircle the sacred fire, Paridhi and Adit, ready to take the crucial seven vows of the Pheras ceremony, we invite you to witness this profound commitment. Our promises signify a lifelong journey together, promising support, understanding, and shared dreams. Your presence will magnify the sanctity of this occasion, infusing it with your heartfelt blessings. Join us in this significant moment as we step into a future woven with love and togetherness. Warmly, Paridhi & Adit

title: Ketan & Disha's wedding
description: This is a traditional Gujarati wedding ceremony where the bride and groom will tie the knot with grand entries followed by fireworks, color blasts and music.

title: Prashanmani & Tapasvi's wedding
description: The groom ties a sacred thread (Mangalsutra) around the bride's neck, and they exchange a mixture of cumin seeds and jaggery Saptapadi: The couple takes seven rounds around sacred fire Talambralu: The couple showers each other with rice mixed with turmeric and saffron, symbolizing happiness and prosperity.

title: Denesh & Darishi's wedding
description: The fun-fill with traditional Hindu wedding

title: Amit & Priya's wedding
description: Ghurchari is a traditional pre-wedding ceremony where the bride's family welcomes the groom and his procession as they arrive at the wedding venue. The groom, accompanied by his family and friends, is greeted with joyous music, dancing, and often, fireworks. It would be really fun part as everyone is going to celebrate and dance together. People will serve snacks and water. Please do let us know if you have any allergens with the food

title: Rishabh & Apoorva's wedding
description: On first day of wedding rituals haldi and sangeet ceremony will begin event is fun filled with pool party
